title: Pediatric Therapeutics
description:
Pediatric Therapeutics helps the medical student, medical professional, nurse, pharmacist and related professions find out the indication or disease for which is active, the correct dose according to age, changes that must be done in patients with renal disease, and correct interval for most drugs on the market today listed by generic name.  It also has a list of very common pediatric problems like arrhythmias, dehydration, neonatology topics, burns, acid base problems, with its current treatment. We also include reference laboratory values (f.ex. biochemistry, hematology, endocrinology).  It also provides vital information on drugs that are given as an infusion, choice of antibiotics, antifungals and antivirals as well as their therapeutic levels.

The 2023 printed edition is also available through rrivera@hospitalcima.com
